transcript: I rewrote their sales script we 5x LTV so I was fun they're like okay so how do we get them to do it I was like pay them $5 every time they read the script and they can also get their commission if they close but they get $5 no matter what if they read the script guess what they're harassing their sales managers about did I get the $5 for the script they they're getting $50 on the sale but they want to know if they got the five bucks they want to know because what happens is the $5 do becomes a proxy for approval and so they like did I do a good job
